caption: Nice place Nice staff I saw today someone went inside without mask (OUTSIDE THEY HAVE THE SIGN NO MASK NO SALE ) and the young boy say sorry I can’t sale you without mask and the person didn’t get nothing All natural fruit juices available I like pastelitos (chicken and cheese) and chicken quipes Always clean place I RECOMMEND IT

I come here frequently and order fresh, delicious inexpensive smoothies.They are custom made to how many fruits and veggies you desire and your choice of OJ,almond milk,cows milk or water.They have nice snacks to munch on with your smoothie.Also I don't speak Spanish very well and they communicate with English no problem.One time the young lady was trying to say corn and I didn't understand her accent so she wrote the word down😂.They are open late and service is pretty quick.My favorite smoothie spot.
NO ONE THERE SPEAK ENGLISH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  HOW IS THE MENU IN ENGLISH BUT NO ONE SPEAKS ENGLISH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  HOW ARE PEOPLE SUPPOSED TO PLACE AN ORDER????????????????
